name: Take On Mars
description: Take On Mars places you right in the middle of mankind’s most exciting undertaking. Start out in the seat of a rover operator, finish as the first human to have ever set foot on the Red Planet.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows Vista or Windows 7 Processor:Intel Core2Duo 2.5 GHz or AMD Athlon Phenom X4 or faster Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:NVIDIA Geforce 8800GT or ATI Radeon HD 3870 with Shader Model 3 and 512 MB VRAM, or faster DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:6 GB HD space Sound:DirectX Audio compatible
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor:Intel Core i5 or AMD Athlon Phenom X4 or faster  Memory:4 GB RAM Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 or faster DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:6 GB HD space Sound:DirectX Audio compatible
